definition: A gerontocracy is a state, society, or group governed by old people.
Finsta is a fake Instagram account. People use Finstas to post content that is deemed inappropriate or too private for their main Instagram account.
FAANG is an acronym for the five best-performing American tech stocks in the market: Meta (formerly Facebook), Apple, Amazon, Netflix, and Google.

Microaggression is a term used for commonplace verbal, behavioral or environmental slights, whether intentional or unintentional, that communicate hostile, derogatory, or negative attitudes toward stigmatized or culturally marginalized groups.

Intersectionality is the interconnected nature of social categorizations such as race, class, and gender as they apply to a given individual or group, regarded as creating overlapping and interdependent systems of discrimination or disadvantage.
Straight coded refers to a character in media that has a subtextual coding as being heterosexual.
Magaga is Trump's new slogan that means make America great and glorious again.
A bra strap bracelet is an elastic bracelet made from bra straps and adorned with charms, personalised stitching and logos.
Bing bong is a nonsensical phrase that people use when excited or emphasizing a point.

Birdnesting is a way of living that enables children to remain in the family home and spend time with each parent there. Divorced parents remain in one home while the parents take turns moving in and out based on the parenting plan.
Soft launching a relationship means teasing that you're in a relationship without sharing any details—or even, in many cases, your new partner's face.

Hogging is a disgusting competition, usually between a group of men that involves going to a house party where participants go with the direct intention of hooking up with the fattest girl at the party.

Sussy baka is a phrase that refers to someone that is a foolish and a suspicious idiot.
yt is an abbreviation that refers to white people.

blm is a movement and phrase meaning "black lives matter" that advocates against police brutality and anti-black racism.

Handwashing, also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands with soap or handwash and water to remove viruses/bacteria/microorganisms, dirt, grease, or other harmful and unwanted substances stuck to the hands.

Florona is apparently the name given to the condition when a patient contracts both Covid-19 and Influenza.
mbn is an acronym that means "must be nice".

The mindset that any dream and goal can be achieved by putting 110% effort, working hard, and giving all you have in something to make money.
A streamer is a type of influencer who broadcasts themselves online through a live stream to an audience.

A person who makes YouTube videos using Gacha games like Gacha life.

Floofy means feathery, puffy, and light.

A health professional (usually nurse) who takes on some of the roles traditionally performed by the doctor.

Nonce is slang for a rapist or child molester; a sexual offender.

OSDD (Other specified dissociative disorder) is a mental health diagnosis for pathological dissociation that matches the DSM-5 criteria for a dissociative disorder, but does not fit the full criteria for any of the specifically identified subtypes.
A bodycam is a small video camera worn on the body, typically used by police officers to record arrests, evidence from crime scenes, etc.

To disassociate means to disconnect mentally from one's thoughts, feelings, memories or sense of identity.

EICR stands for 'Electrical Installation Condition Report'. An EICR is when your electrical installations are tested by a 'skilled' person to ensure they are safe and they will not cause any fire risks or electric shocks.

Grizzles is a misspelling of the word Grizzlies.

liming is when people are hanging around, usually in a public place with friends, enjoying the scene.
